name: distributed-tracing-example
description: Distributed tracing with OpenTelemetry and Jaeger

scripts.start:local: concurrently "npm run gateway" "npm run order" "npm run inventory" "npm run payment"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:services
scripts.build:services: cd services/gateway && npm install && cd ../order && npm install && cd ../inventory && npm install && cd ../payment && npm install
